) } render(){ const {handleSubmit} = this.props; var weekday = new Array(7); weekday[0] = "Sunday"; weekday[1] = "Monday"; weekday[2] = "Tuesday"; weekday[3] = "Wednesday"; weekday[4] = "Thursday"; weekday[5] = "Friday"; weekday[6] = "Saturday"; var books = []; var new_book = ['08:00 - 08:30','08:30-09:00','09:00-09:30','09:30-10:00','10:00-10:30','10:30-11:00','11:00-11:30','11:30-12:00']; books.push(new_book); const dayTime={} const destro = _.map(weekday,(day) =>{ dayTime = { day:books[0] } // console.log('day ',day); }) // const destro = { "Monday":books[0],"Tuesday":books[0],"Wednesday":books[0],"Thursday":books[0] } console.log(dayTime); return (
